concept.title: Path analysis workflow
concept.shortdesc: provides path analysis features that help you to focus only on the customer paths that are most relevant to your business goals.

conbody.p: The following steps are an overview of the workflow for using to analyze customer paths.

ol.li: Determine the criteria of the paths you want to analyze, depending upon your business objectives. You can focus on key customer behaviors and specific date ranges.
Create a path report that specifies the criteria you want to use.

Visualize customer paths. Access the results of your path request and choose from various views of the paths. Use these views to identify patterns and trends that can help you to understand how customers are engaging with your organization or brand.
View customer behavior within channels. See how customers interact with your organization within each of the channels in a path.
Share insights from your path analysis with colleagues.
